100.name: Improved Rangs
100.description: Can pop up to 8 Bloons per throw.

200.name: Glaives
200.description: Throws sharper and faster glaives instead of boomerangs.

300.name: Glave Ricochet
300.description: Glaives will bounce from Bloon to Bloon automatically and aggressively.

400.name: M.O.A.R Glaives
400.description: Multiple Object Advanced Ricochet greatly enhances the already extraordinary powers of the Glaive Ricochet Monkey.

500.name: Glaive Lord
500.description:
Glaive Lord surrounds itself in 3 special glaives that shred anything that comes near.
Glaive Lord's glaives now rip through MOAB-class Bloons, slowly tearing them apart from the inside.

030.name: Bionic Boomerang
030.description: Replaces arm with a strong bionic arm that can throw boomerangs extremely fast and does extra damage to MOAB-class bloons.

040.name: Turbo Charge
040.description: Turbo Charge ability: Makes this Monkey attack incredibly fast for 10 seconds.

050.name: Perma Charge
050.description: Perma Charge has a permanent super fast attack speed. Ability increases the lethality even more.

001.name: Long Range Rangs
001.description: Can throw boomerangs further than normal.

002.name: Red Hot Rangs
002.description: Allows boomerangs to pop Frozen and Lead Bloons and do more damage to all.

003.name: Kylie Boomerang
003.description: Throws heavy Kylie boomerangs that follow a straight path instead of curved.

004.name: MOAB Press
004.description: Heavy Kylie boomerangs hit MOAB-Class Bloons multiple times per throw and sometimes knocks them back a short way along the path.

005.name: MOAB Domination
005.description: Special knockback kylies trigger more often and do lots of extra damage.

600.name: Glaive Dominus
600.description: The Bloons will look upon my Glaives, and they will know fear.
